message.name: ERR_EXTRA_UNDEFINED_METADATA
message.locale: An error occurred gathering information about a file to send to the configured Content Management System. Please inform your system administrator.

message.name: ERR_MISSING_REQUIRED_METADATA
message.locale: An error occurred gathering information about a file to send to the configured Content Management System. Please inform your system administrator.

message.name: ERR_REPLACE_FILE_NO_ARGUMENTS_TO_REPLACE
message.locale: An error occurred updating a file on the configured Content Management System. Please inform your system administrator.

message.name: ERR_CANNOT_CHECK_IN
message.locale: An error occurred updating a file on the configured Content Management System. Please inform your system administrator.

message.name: ERR_IO_ISSUE_ON_READ
message.locale: An error occurred reading a file on the configured Content Management System. Please inform your system administrator.

message.name: ERR_REPLACE_FILE_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: The file '%1s' could not be found within '%2s' on the Content Management System. Please inform your system administrator.

message.name: ERR_MULTI_FILING
message.locale: The file '%1s' was found in multiple locations within '%2s' on the Content Management System. Modification is not supported in this scenario.

message.name: ERR_BAD_ROOT_FOLDER
message.locale: The application property 'curam.cms.curam.dir' must be in the form '/x/y/z'. Please contact your administrator.

message.name: ERR_CONNECTING_TO_CMIS
message.locale: The configured Content Management System is unavailable. Please contact your administrator.

message.name: ERR_GENERIC_CMIS
message.locale: An error occurred while interacting with the Content Management System. Please inform your system administrator.

message.name: ERR_BAD_FILEPATH
message.locale: The file was not found on the Content Management System. Please contact your administrator.

message.name: ERR_BAD_OBJECTID
message.locale: The file is no longer on the Content Management System. Please contact your administrator.
